data: {"generalSituation":"A broad band of clouds will bring a few rain patches to the northern part of the South China Sea today. A fresh to strong easterly airstream will reach the coast of Guangdong later today. It will be windy over the region in the next couple of days. The northeast monsoon is expected to affect the coastal areas of southern China gradually towards the weekend. The weather over the region will be slightly cooler in the morning during the weekend and early next week. Besides, the broad area of low pressure over the southern part of the South China Sea will move towards Vietnam today.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251028","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4. East force 5 later, occasionally force 6 offshore.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two rain patches in the morning and at night.
